Docs.summary: Exposes the public members of the class to unmanaged code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
This interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.

Docs.summary: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the method.
Docs.returns: The hash code for the current instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method serves as a hash function for a particular type. <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
